Cadastral Practices

Complete solutions for all Cadastral practices

Home > Services > Cadastral Practices

Administrative practice agencies in Milan, including Acentro Services, offer various services related to cadastral practices. Acentro Services provides support for managing formalities and compliance with public administration entities.

Here is a detailed list of services offered for cadastral practices:

Cadastral Services

Online Cadastral Reports

Request and obtaining of online cadastral reports for land and buildings, with updated and complete information.

Online Report, Floor Plan, and Property Consistency

Complete service including report, cadastral floor plan, and details on property consistency.

Map Extracts

Request and obtaining of cadastral map extracts, essential for verifying the correct graphical representation of properties.

Cadastral Floor Plans

Recovery of cadastral floor plans that graphically represent the internal layout of properties and their measurements.

Land Registry Practices

Mortgage Inspections

Verification of mortgages, seizures, or other encumbrances on properties through inspections at the Land Registry.

Document Filing

Complete assistance for filing documents with the Land Registry.

Mortgage Reports

Request and obtaining of mortgage reports to verify the legal status of properties.

Related Digital Services

Acentro Services also offers digital services such as Digital Signature and Certified Email (PEC), which are useful tools for simplifying operational processes related to communication with the Cadastre.

DIGIPRAM: The Management Software for Administrative Practices

Additionally, Acentro Services provides DIGIPRAM, a management software designed for administrative practice agencies, which facilitates practice management and offers features such as document management.

Benefits of our cadastral services

Time saving

Avoid long waits at counters and complex bureaucratic procedures.

Professionalism

Expert staff who perfectly understand cadastral procedures.

Complete documentation

We provide all necessary documentation in digital or paper format.

Continuous assistance

Support throughout the entire cadastral practice process.

Need assistance with your cadastral practices?

Contact us for a personalized consultation and discover how we can help you simplify the management of your practices with the Cadastre.

Request Information

Fast and efficient solutions for businesses and professionals since 1986.
